Name: Indecent Details - Find the Difference
About the game: Indecent Details is a barebones free adult “find the differences” game. This zero-budget title has dozens of images to distract you with, if you are bored enough to give it a spin. Indecent Details includes a mix of art styles featuring new and old art from LarsMidnatt, which isn’t saying much. But if you have made it this far, some of it might have caught your eye. Enjoy! ADVISORY Differences may be subtle and difficult to spot depending on a variety of factors. Monitor calibration, screen size, viewing angle and color blindness may make finding differences harder for some compared to others. Bring your own music there is no in-game music. All characters are 18 years or older.
